message.body: We will make our own school via telepathy and texts and dreams. It is awful to not feel good at (actual) school sometimes. I hate that. I have has tears tears tears and humiliation but also pride and glory and nice walks at lunch.
If you like the telephone you can always call and I will tell you stories about taxidermy or unicorns or other fun stuff.

I have been thinking about what you said about the Triple Heater having the potential to harmonize the three jiaos and I love that. If anyone can do it, you can. I'll take out the trash (empty the rubbish bins) as best I can.
Say hello to Earth for me. Put her in a cute and quirky but safe place and watch how spunky sweet her smile is. ❤❤
You're the best. Thanks Monica. Saving this text until my board exam. Earth says " hi and damn, I thought you'd never move me! Girls getting a rash!"
OMG I loved waking up to these texts from you!!! Earth is so stunning. I can't even believe it. I reset my phone display to be her!

I did have my now dead kitty Lotti as my background but Earth will be a good backdrop for awhile. Here's Lotti! She was the love of my life! Most probably a colon cf too. Bitchy and picky and glamorous with a bum leg, FIV, allergies, picky as hell, and in
And look at this photo I took in your bedroom. The yellow light of ghost points (which I have never seen completely yet) leaking out (or in) from the front room ￼

And one more photo, for Earth. She will be pleased as punch to hear that I felt compelled to actually put on earrings today. I recently cleaned my jewelry box and found these earrings I got from the avon catalogue at age 10. I put them on for her but they
